title: Validate leads email addresses with Hunter.io and Google Sheets
description:
### **How it works:**

This project automatically verifies lead email addresses stored in Google Sheets using Hunter.io. It checks each email‚Äôs validity and writes back the results‚Äîincluding confidence scores, verification status, and metadata‚Äîso your outreach lists are always clean and reliable.

This workflow runs daily, reads from a source sheet, verifies emails via API, and writes results into another sheet. No manual checking. No wasted leads.

### **Step-by-step:**

- **Schedule Trigger:**
The workflow is scheduled to run automatically once per day, but you can also run it manually when needed.

- **Fetch Emails:**
Reads emails from a Google Sheet (named Sheet1) with columns like Email, FirstName, LastName, and Company.

- **Data Cleaning:**
Filters out blank or invalid email formats before verification to save API usage.

- **Hunter.io Verification:**
Each email is passed to Hunter.io‚Äôs /email-verifier API, returning status (valid, invalid, risky), SMTP check, score (0‚Äì100), and disposable flag.

- **Format Results:**
The API response is converted into a human-readable summary like:
‚úÖ Valid (96% confidence) or ‚ùå Invalid / Risky

- **Write to Sheet:**
The verified results are written back into your output Google Sheet‚Äîeither appending new rows or updating existing ones.

### **Setup instructions:**

- **Google Sheet:**
Use a sheet named Sheet1 and ensure it includes these columns:
Email, FirstName, LastName, Company.

- **Hunter.io Key:**
Sign up at hunter.io.

Go to Dashboard ‚Üí API ‚Üí Copy your key

In n8n, open the Email Verifier node ‚Üí Create Credential ‚Üí Paste your API key ‚Üí Save
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
